::Slayer::

Skayer growls as Lunarpine's claws take out his shoulder cannons, 
sending both bots flying back from the impact. Bringing up his rifle 
right up to Lunarpine's stomach, he pull sthe trigger.

He needed to end this battle soon, he was lacking fluids at an 
alarming rate.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> IN his half wolf state Lunarpines repair systems continue to work. 
> This fight was pushing his systems to the limits, as soon as one 
> wound was healed another opened. Slayer seemed to know this. Pride 
> seemed to be the only reason this fight continued. Lunarpine 
refused 
> to lose. He wasn't losing fluid nearly as fast as Slayer so he knew 
> that he could outlast the bot even if it caust Lunarpine his own 
> life. He wanted to save Shadow Wing but not if it cost the rest of 
> the maximals thier lives by giving the traitor the chance to live. 
If 
> he left Slayer's weapons alone Slayer would continue fighting and 
> Lunarpine would have the opportunity to finish him. He had a better 
> idea though. he leapt forward again slashing both claws at Slayers 
> shoulder cannons and biting for his neck. If he got a hold on him 
at 
> close range this battle would be as good as over with Lunarpine the 
> victor.
